addonName.message: Help us to give you a better web experience by giving you feedback!

addonDescription.message: An experiment to gather user feedback for websites broken by webcompat issues.

issueLabelDesktopNotMobile.message: Desktop site instead of mobile site

titleInitialPromptIntroduction.message: Help us give you a better web experience.

textInitialPromptIntroduction.message: Are you satisfied with how this website works in Firefox?

privacyPolicy.message: Sending feedback will submit this domain to Mozilla. Your data will be handled in accordance with Mozilla's privacy policy.

titleThankYouFeedback.message: Thank you. Your feedback helps us make Firefox—and the web—better.

textThankYouFeedback.message: If you experience problems again, you can report them by selecting the broken page icon from the address bar.

textFeedbackForm.message: Please tell us more about your experience on this site so we can understand and fix the issue.

textFeedbackDetails.message: This data is non-public. Only certain Mozilla employees will have access to this data.

linkShowFeedbackDetails.message: See what data I am sending
